Academic policies, priorities and initiatives

The AHS Faculty Mentoring Program supports junior faculty with their career development through mentorship from faculty within and outside of their respective academic departments. Junior faculty are strongly encouraged to attend mentoring introduction workshops, which are held twice a year. New faculty are invited to attend by the dean’s office.
